comment_calibration:
=== Calibration file for automatic m/z bounds detection ===
    Convert a representative RAW file to Arrow format, then provide path here.
    Used to detect fragment and precursor m/z ranges for your instrument.
comment_fasta_regex: === FASTA header parsing (defaults work for UniProt format) ===
comment_library:
=== Library m/z bounds ===
    Note: If auto_detect_frag_bounds=true (default), these bounds are automatically
    detected from calibration_raw_file. Set to false to use manual bounds below.
comment_modifications: === Modifications (variable and fixed, including PTMs and peptide-terminal labels) ===
